document.docAuthor: Saaed, Manam W. B., El-Barasi, Yacoub M. & Rahil, Rebeh O.
document.masterDocTitle: An updated checklist and quantitative analysis of the Marmarica Plateau flora, in the north-eastern part of Libya

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An updated checklist and quantitative analysis of the Marmarica Plateau flora, in the north-eastern part of Libya
